snippet: A Beijing court sentenced Ni Yulan and her husband on charges of creating a disturbance, an advocacy group said.
abstract: Ni Yulan, Chinese rights advocate who was crippled by abuse in prison, is sentenced along with her husband to a new prison term of two years and eight months on charges of creating a disturbance.
lead_paragraph: A Beijing court sentenced Ni Yulan and her husband on charges of creating a disturbance, an advocacy group said.

headline.seo: Ni Yulan, Rights Advocate, Given Prison Term in China
headline.main: Rights Advocate Given Prison Term in China
headline.print_headline: China More Jail for Rights Advocate
